title: Peopletoys (Horror, 1974) Sorrell Booke, Gene Evans, Taylor Lacher | Movie

sources.title: Peopletoys (Horror, 1974) Sorrell Booke, Gene Evans, Taylor Lacher | Movie
sources.description:
What Wendy just saw them do will make you sick to your stomach...if it doesn't make you faint first!
After five deranged children are involved in a bus wreck they start killing people at the lodge who insulted them or were rude to them.

Peopletoys (1974) Also known as: The Horrible House on the Hill / Devil Times Five

Directors: Sean MacGregor, David Sheldon
Writers: John Durren, Dylan Jones, Sandra Lee Blowitz
Stars: Sorrell Booke, Gene Evans, Taylor Lacher, Leif Garrett
Genre: Horror Movie


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
01:24 A group prepares for a trip to the mountains, facing challenges and discussing family dynamics.
13:07 Disturbing events unfold in a house involving manipulation, power play, and dark secrets.
19:48 A group faces mysterious events and struggles to survive in a remote lodge during a snowstorm.
34:07 A group of survivors in a secluded location deal with sickness, power struggles, and mysterious events.
41:21 A group of individuals, including a nun, face challenges and secrets in a remote location.
49:48 A group of adults discuss strange behaviors among children in a remote location.
55:42 A group faces mysterious events in a secluded location, leading to suspicion and tension.
1:05:28 A chilling tale of betrayal, fear, and revenge unfolds in a secluded setting.
1:15:23 A group of people in a snowy location face danger and betrayal, leading to a deadly confrontation.
